duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide traditional construction dispute case leadership including analysis, opinion, and expert testimony in support of mediation, arbitration, or trial proceedings.
Manage multiple caseloads and have an extensive track record of project testimony and stellar reputation in the industry.
Expand the SOCOTEC Advisory client base through industry networking and opportunity development.
Prepare statements of qualification and engagement letters.
Develop project strategy, work plans, and budgets.
Perform, review, and critique schedule and cost analysis.
Draft, review, and critique presentations and report demonstratives.
Provide opinion framework and write and edit expert opinion(s).
Provide expert testimony or a desire to be qualified as an 'expert' to provide testimony.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Engineering, Architecture, or Construction Management
